product_name: Pearl Izumi Select Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: The Pearl Izumi Select Bike Jersey for women is styled to combine technical fabric with 2 back storage pockets for a perfect all-around cycling jersey. 100% polyester fabric offers compression, moisture transfer and UPF 50+ sun protection. Full-lenth zipper offers customizable venting. 2 back pockets. The Pearl Izumi Select Bike Jersey for women has reflective elements for greater visibility in low light.
short_description: The Pearl Izumi Select Bike Jersey for women is styled to combine technical fabric with 2 back storage pockets for a perfect all-around cycling jersey.
